comment:
>>37806059

Your hand snaps up with an unfamiliar speed to grab the Pegasus around the ankle, as its trajectory curves upward, parallel to the Cathedral's front wall. You twist your body around, feeling a slight vertigo as you're yanked off the ground.

The Pegasus looks like it could slam you against the wall. The fist-fighter is a little ways behind you. She's quick, close to catching up.

> Start slashing and try to swing up before your buff runs out.
> Reach for Tatsumaki.
> Let go, and take a slash as you fall.
> Other.
name: BSO
